title: Stonjourner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Body Press** Attack someone. You will use your Defense Value instead of Attack Value.
**Harden** The next night, up your Defense Value.
**Sandstorm** Summon a Sandstorm. For the next 2 nights, gain Powerful Defense. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Harden** can stack as long as you use It multiple nights in a row.

fields.name: Special Ability:
fields.value: **Power Spot** If you're killed at night, all of your allies gain Unstoppable Attack and Invincible Defense for the next night.
